column5: Hi there~ you're not alone for sure -- I suffered from an AN when I was 14 and struggled with it till I was around 16. From 17 to 18 I made some progress towards recovery, but from 21 I basically teetered on the edge of a relapse until I finally fell through the cracks last year at 23. I'm 24 this year and currently working through my relapse. You're not alone, sending hugs.
